project.name: ADK Tools - Core Tools
project.description:
Core tools for Jimi ADK with zero external dependencies (JDK-only).
Separation Criteria: This module contains tools that ONLY depend on JDK standard libraries and adk-api. No Spring, no third-party libraries. This ensures the core tool set remains lightweight and has minimal transitive dependency footprint.
Included tools: - ReadFileTool : Read file content with line range support - WriteFileTool : Write/create files (requires approval) - ListDirTool : List directory contents with recursive support - GlobTool : Glob pattern file matching - BashTool : Shell command execution (requires approval)
Tools requiring external dependencies (Spring WebFlux, java-diff-utils, etc.) belong in adk-tools-extended.
